message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair share while acknowledging the diminishing value of money over rounds.
A 60/40 split is a fair and reasonable offer, considering the diminishing value of money for both of us.
I propose an equal split of the $10,000, recognizing the decreasing value of money in each subsequent round. This ensures fairness and mutual benefit.
